                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String category,

                                         java.lang.String typeCard)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Allows the logged user to find certain cards in their collection, through the filters of the search bar.
        Specified by:
        filters in interface CollectionOwnDao
        Parameters:
        user - logged user
        name - the name of the card searched.
        category - the category of the cards searched.
        classCard - the class of the cards searched .
        typeCard - type of the cards searched.
        Returns:
        requested cards from logged user.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception caused by database error.
